question: You are utilizing Azure OpenAI Service to develop generative AI solutions. What is a primary concern that needs to be addressed to minimize the risk of harmful content generation?
In leveraging generative AI for creating customer-relevant content on a website, which Azure AI service would be most appropriate to use?
When operationalizing generative AI applications with Azure Machine Learning, what is a crucial part of the AI lifecycle that needs monitoring?
You need to build an app that will summarize text documents into key phrases. Which Azure AI Language feature should you recommend?

You have an app that sends audio recordings from a call center to the speech-to-text feature of Azure AI Services. During testing, you notice that the Word Error Rate (WER) is high and there are a lot of substitution errors. You need to improve the model and reduce the WER. What should you add to the training data?

You are building an app that will recognize the intent and entities of user utterances in real-time. You need to implement the pattern matching intent recognition mechanism. The solution must only detect entities that you define in a catalog of phrases. Which entity type should you use?
options: the List entity using Fuzzy mode
the List entity using Strict mode
the prebuilt entity using Fuzzy mode
the prebuilt entity using Strict mode
the regex entity using Fuzzy mode
the regex entity using Strict mode

question: You are building an Azure AI Translator custom model. You need to ensure that the translation accuracy for the model has a Bilingual Evaluation Understudy (BLEU) score that indicates high quality. What is the minimum score range required?
You are building a model that uses Conversational Language Understanding (CLU). You need to measure how accurate the model is. Which metric should you use?

You have a question answering project. A customer asks a question that is not part of the project. You review the active learning suggestions and do not see any suggestions. You need to ensure that customer questions are included in the active learning suggestions. The solution must minimize administrative effort. What should you do?
options: Add the customer questions to the editor manually.
Wait at least 30 minutes before checking for suggestions.
category: Implement knowledge mining and document intelligence solutions (10–15%)

question: You plan to build a chatbot that will help users answer FAQs. You need to identify which scenarios are suitable for use with the Azure AI Language question answering service. Which three scenarios should you identify? Each correct answer presents a complete solution.
options: when you have a bot conversation that includes dynamic information
when you have a bot conversation that includes static information
when you have dynamic information in a knowledge base of answers
when you have static information in a knowledge base of answers
when you need to provide the same answer to a request, question, or command
when you need to provide unique answers to each request, question, or command

question: You are building a solution that uses Azure Cognitive Search. You need to define the field attributes for a field where the search results will include a hit count by category. Which attribute should you assign to the field?
category: Implement knowledge mining and document intelligence solutions (10–15%)

question: You plan to build an app that will use Azure AI Services. You need to identify the methods that can be used to authenticate to Azure AI Services. Which two methods can you use? Each correct answer presents a complete solution.
category: Plan and manage an Azure AI solution (15–20%)

question: You are building a multi-tenant bot in JavaScript based on Azure AI Bot Service. You need to configure the identity information in the bot configuration file. The solution must minimize bot authentication errors. Which three properties should you configure? Each correct answer presents part of the solution.
You are building a chatbot by using Azure AI Bot Service. You need to query log entries for unsuccessful requests. Which Kusto query should you run?
options: ABSBotRequests | where ResultCode < 200 or ResultCode >= 300 | sort by TimeGenerated desc
ABSBotRequests | where ResultCode > 200 or ResultCode <= 300 | sort by TimeGenerated desc
ABSBotRequests | where ResultCode == 200 or ResultCode == 201 | sort by TimeGenerated desc
ABSBotRequests | where ResultCode >= 200 | sort by TimeGenerated desc
category: Plan and manage an Azure AI solution (15–20%)

question: You are building a Language Understanding model by using Azure AI Language service. You need to implement continuous integration/continuous deployment (CI/CD) by using an automation workflow. Which two tools should you include in the solution? Each correct answer presents part of the solution.
You are developing a decision support system that needs to analyze large datasets to provide real-time insights. Which Azure AI service would be most appropriate?
In order to provide recommendations for product upselling, you need to implement a system that analyzes historical purchase data. Which of the following algorithms would be suitable?
You need to build a system that helps in forecasting quarterly sales numbers based on historical data. Which Azure AI service would you leverage for this task?
